Articles.Content: Greetings all kerbonauts! I have been playing KSP for a while now, and just recently got the full version about a half of a year ago. I am here mainly to join in on the KSP community and see what kind of things other players are coming up with to do, as well as all of the mods that have been created to enhance the experience.I suppose I should say something else, but I have nothing....Oh well. Ã¥â€ ÂÃ¨Â§ÂÃ¯Â¼ÂNo, I'm not Chinese. And I did not use Google Translate.I'm just fabulous. And somewhat multilingual.Anyway, I'm just looking for people to talk to. It gets alone here in the KSC...

well, what have you accomplished so far in ksp? ive gotten two manned missions in orbit around the mun which failed during the landing phase, a half broken rover on the surface of duna and one lightweight probe on an solar escape mission (launched on a falcon 9 heavy from Lazurus Luans Laztek pack)
Welcome to the Forums! Feel free to share pics here or just check out the crafts in our crafts subforum. So much to do! Enjoy your stay
Welcome! May you never stage your decouplers before your boosters!

Welcome! May you never stage your decouplers before your boosters!
Never done that, actually... I usually check my staging before each launch.
